sentence.Network_en: The seriousness of the situation is difficult to appreciate in its totality .
sentence.Network_cn: 很难从全局上理解局势的严重性。

sentence.Network_en: He did not want to reform the criminal justice system in its totality.
sentence.Network_cn: 他不想全盘改革刑事司法制度。

sentence.Network_en: Totality also includes the role of practice in social change.
sentence.Network_cn: 总体也包括实践在社会变迁中的作用.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 考博英语词汇 ... toss v. n. 扔；抛，掷；猛举 totality n. 全体；总数；总额 totally ad. 统统；完全.
整体（totality）本质上带有超验或超越的特点，以整体为指向，往往很难避免对个体与特殊的消解。布伯曾将个人所处的关系区分为 …
第二是诗的整体性(totality)：日常的言语行动不一定是完整的，但诗却是自足的整体，理解诗也总是力求把诗中各部分连贯成一整体， …
对总体性(totality)的迷戀中觉醒；进入后现代意义浮动的多元世界

lj.lj_ly: a deeper exploration of life in its totality.

entry.def: The totality of something is the whole of it.

example.ex: ...a process of social, economic and political change which involves the totality of human experience...
example.tran: 涉及人类全部经验的社会、经济和政治变革过程

example.ex: He did not want to reform the criminal justice system in its totality.
example.tran: 他不想全盘改革刑事司法制度。
